data.name: House of Sin - Kitsune
data.detailed_description:
Meet the unique manager, Kitsune!
Powerful abilities, greater stats and shorter cooldowns are his main assets!
Invite him to your Love Garden to look after the girls! Kitsune can use his powerful magic boosters and increase overall income more than 3 times!
Don’t miss the chance to boost your in-game performance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Core 2 Duo and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains explicit content that is not suited for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All scenes are uncensored. There are no scenes of non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
All characters depicted are over the age of 18.
